EVENT 2
A CHECK_CLASS 211  
E RUN_EVENT 3
E RUN_EVENT 4

END

EVENT 3
A CHECK_SKILL_POINT 5 30 39 
E SELECT_MSG 11810 1 3 8 -1 -1 -1 -1 -1 -1 -1 -1                      
END

EVENT 13
A CHECK_OVER_WEIGHT 30
E SAY 118 -1 -1 -1 -1 -1 -1 -1 -1 -1  
E RETURN
END

EVENT 14
A CHECK_UNDER_WEIGHT 30 
A CHECK_EXIST_ITEM 389010000 10
A CHECK_EXIST_ITEM 379001000 10
E ROB_ITEM 389010000 10 
E ROB_ITEM 379001000 10 
E GIVE_ITEM 389011000 10 
E RETURN
END
